summary.span: 包含支持 Windows 窗体和 WPF 控件的互操作的类。

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包含启用之间进行互操作的类[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技术。The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. 当你使用类，可以承载[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]上的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]页面，和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-基于应用程序。When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. 实现互操作功能的两个关键类是和。The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 你使用的类取决于控件的实现：Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - 使用类时必须使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]页。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - 使用类时必须使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-基于应用程序。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
